TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 444
TEI.2.document_title: Mariano Cosio to Stephen F Austin, 07-10-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: Mariano Cosio to Austin, Goliad, July 10, 1830. Asks Austin's assistance in transporting troops from Goliad to Nacogdoches. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 444

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Mariano Cosio to Austin, Goliad, July 10, 1830. Asks Austin's assistance in transporting troops from Goliad to Nacogdoches. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Goliad*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="07-10-1830">July 10, 1830*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*See Calendar*/p*
*/div1*
